101.「生きとし生ける者は 皆 神の子。| 我が教会へ よくぞ まいられた！|<br>:
Every living being is a child of the Almighty|One. Welcome to our church!|
|In this world, the Almighty One is always|watching over you. Therefore, you don't need|to come here to record your journey in your|
|Adventure Log.|,br>|That being said, it's still a good idea to|pray in a church. Praying will allow you to|change your resurrection spot.|
|When you've finished adventuring for the day,|you can take a break by using the Misc.|command and then "Log Out". If you're outside|of town, this might take a bit longer.|
|So then, what can our church assist you with?|

102.「神に みちびかれし 迷える子羊よ。| ようこそ 我が教会へ。|<br>|「この:
The lost and found... Welcome to my home. In|this world, God is always watching over your|every move. So you don't have to go to church|
|to record your travels in a book of|adventures... But if you say a prayer in the|church, it will change your resurrection|
|place to the church where you prayed, in case|you run out of energy. If you wish to end|your adventure, you may do so at any time by|
|using the "Abort Adventure" command... but it|may take some time in dangerous places. So,|what can I do for you today?

103.「変更しないと 申されるか。| それも よろしかろう。|<bw_break>: I don't think we should... That's fine.<bw_break>

104.「変更しないのですね。| それも ひとつの選択肢でしょう。|<bw_break>: I don't want to change... It's an option...<bw_break>
